job_description:
Junior Geophysicist - Fiber-optic Sensing & AI (Fresher)

We are seeking a motivated Junior Geophysicist (recent graduate) to dive into projects involving Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS), fiber‑optic sensor data, and Python‑driven AI analysis. You’ll work closely with geophysicists, data scientists, and engineers to drive data‑centric insights and support field deployments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support data acquisition, preprocessing, and interpretation from fiber‑optic sensing systems (DAS/DTS).
  • Analyze large time‑series datasets using Python (NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib).
  • Collaborate with AI/ML experts to build models for signal classification, event detection, or anomaly identification.
  • Participate in field activities, including deploying sensors, monitoring systems, and validating datasets.
  • Document workflows, results, and technical insights clearly in reports or code comments.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Geophysics, Geoscience, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.
  • Fundamental understanding of seismic wave behavior and fiber‑optic sensing principles.
  • Basic proficiency in Python and experience with data‑analysis libraries.
  • Interest in machine learning—any exposure to scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Excellent analytical thinking, communication skills, and collaborative mindset.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

  • Experience with signal processing, time‑series analysis, or seismic inversion methods.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Jupyter notebooks.
  • Willingness and physical ability to participate in occasional fieldwork and travel.

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands‑on experience at the intersection of geophysics, fiber‑optic sensing, and AI.
  • Mentorship from industry professionals and cross‑disciplinary collaboration.
  • Exposure to real‑world problems in energy, infrastructure, and environmental monitoring.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Recent graduate Junior Geophysicist needed for fiber-optic sensing and AI projects. Responsibilities include data analysis, model building, and field deployments. Requires Python proficiency and geophysics knowledge.

About Techversant: Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. What’s important to us: We are looking for a skilled Automation Test Engineer with a solid background in software testing and at least 4 years of hands-on automation experience. The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills in test automation frameworks, excellent communication abilities, and a proactive, positive attitude. Leadership qualities and the ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams will be key to success in this role.

Key Responsibilities: - Design, develop, and maintain robust automated test scripts and frameworks for web, mobile, and API testing. - Collaborate with developers, QA, and product teams to ensure high-quality releases. - Execute automated and manual tests to validate system functionality, performance, and reliability. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps). - Perform root cause analysis on failed tests and report defects with detailed logs and evidence. - Continuously enhance automation coverage and improve test efficiency. - Contribute to test strategy, planning, and estimation activities. - Mentor junior team members and share best practices for automation and testing processes.

Must Have Skills: - Minimum 6 years of experience in software testing (manual + automation). - Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience with any of the popular automation tools such as: Playwright, Selenium, Cypress, Appium, TestNG, Postman, RestAssured, Robot Framework, or Katalon Studio. - Proficiency in at least one programming language: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or C#. - Strong understanding of QA methodologies, SDLC, STLC, and defect management processes. - Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Git/GitHub, and Test Management tools (e.g., TestRail, Zephyr, Azure Test Plans). - Good exposure to API testing and automation. - Experience in Agile/Scrum environments.

Preferred Skills: - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. - Strong leadership and mentoring abilities. - Demonstrated proactiveness, ownership, and a positive attitude. - Experience in performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner) is a plus. - Knowledge of cloud-based testing (AWS, Azure, or Docker-based environments) is desirable.

Qualification Required: - Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related discipline.

What Company Offers: - Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies. - Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off! - Family Medical Insurance. - Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance. - Long term growth opportunities. - Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers. - Various internal employee rewards programs based on Performance. - Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through idea and innovation. - Work life Balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc. - Company Sponsored International Tours.

In this role, you will be responsible for generating leads, building strong client relationships, and driving revenue through the sale of IT services and digital solutions. If you have a passion for technology, consultative selling, and business growth, we’d love to hear from you!

Responsibilities

  • Understand client needs and propose tailored IT and digital transformation solutions that align with business objectives.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers (Founders, CXOs, Product Owners).
  • Collaborate with delivery, design, and marketing teams to craft compelling proposals and client presentations.
  • Maintain accurate records of all sales activities in CRM tools and provide regular sales forecasts and reports.
  • Represent the company at networking events, industry meetups, and client meetings to enhance visibility and build trust.
  • Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly revenue targets consistently.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree or a combination of relevant education, training, and experience.
  • 2 - 5 years of experience in B2B sales within the IT services or digital solutions industry.
  • Proven ability to independently manage the sales pipeline and close deals.
  • Strong understanding of software development services, including web and mobile applications, SaaS, and enterprise solutions.
  • Experience working with international clients is preferred.
  • Familiarity with CRM systems (Zoho, HubSpot, Salesforce) and outbound sales tools like LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
  • Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
  • Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and take complete ownership of sales targets.
  • Strategic thinker with the ability to understand client pain points and position appropriate solutions.

Experience and Education

  • Bachelor’s degree or BSc. IT or CS / BCA / B-Tech IT, CS or EC, MBA, Diploma in CS / IT.
  • Additional certifications in sales, digital marketing, or business consulting will be a plus.

job_description:
SOC Lead/ Senior Consultant Specialist

Role Overview

The SOC Lead serves as a senior member of the Monitoring and Threat Detection function. This role focuses on high-quality incident triage, technical escalation management, continuous improvement of detection capabilities, and leading incident analysis across enterprise-wide environments. The SOC Lead mentors L1/L2 analysts, ensures SLA compliance, and drives process innovation within the SOC.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead deeper security investigations (L2/L3) and advanced triage of escalated alerts across SIEM, EDR, and email security platforms.
  • Collaborate with Threat Detection, Incident Response, and Threat Hunting teams to validate and escalate potential threats.
  • Oversee quality assurance of security tickets and ensure accurate root cause and kill chain identification.
  • Manage the design and optimization of detection rules, threat correlation logic, and playbooks within SIEM/SOAR tools.
  • Provide subject matter expertise in high-severity incident response and containment, ensuring coordinated communication with clients and internal stakeholders.
  • Conduct and support Purple Team simulations and threat validation exercises to assess detection efficacy.
  • Mentor and guide SOC analysts, fostering technical growth and enforcing operational discipline.
  • Coordinate with enterprise teams on email and cloud security incidents, leading Proofpoint and Microsoft 365 Defender investigations.
  • Define and maintain documentation including incident response procedures, triage guides, and detection playbooks.
  • Contribute to automation initiatives to reduce repetitive manual work and improve response efficiency.

Core Skills and Experience

  • 5–9 years of cybersecurity operations experience, with at least 3–4 years in SOC L2/L3 or senior incident response roles.
  • Hands-on expertise with multiple SIEM platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure Wazuh, Splunk, Log360, Elastic).
  • Proficient with leading EDR tools such as CrowdStrike, Microsoft Defender, SentinelOne, Fortinet.
  • Strong working knowledge of Email Security (TAP, DLP, Threat Response, SPF/DKIM/DMARC) tools such as FortiMail, Microsoft Purview, Proofpoint
  • Expertise in attack vectors, MITRE ATT&CK mapping, threat analysis, and incident containment strategies.
  • Solid understanding of enterprise infrastructure — networks, firewalls, endpoint platforms, OS (Windows/Linux), and web applications.
  • Excellent knowledge of cloud security operations across Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud.
  • Awareness of major security frameworks: ISO 27001, NIST, CIS, OWASP, and PCI DSS.
  • Functional knowledge of SOAR automation and orchestration workflows.

Leadership and Delivery

  • Lead service operations ensuring incident SLAs are consistently met.
  • Conduct regular performance reviews and provide knowledge-sharing sessions to elevate SOC maturity.
  • Liaise with customers to discuss incident outcomes, mitigations, and improvement recommendations.
  • Manage process documentation and enforce consistent global SOC methodologies.

Desired Certifications

  • CEH, GCIA, GCIH, CISSP, or equivalent cybersecurity certifications.
  • Vendor-specific credentials (Microsoft, Proofpoint, or SIEM/EDR certifications) preferred.

Additional Attributes

  • Strong analytical, investigative, and documentation skills.
  • Excellent communication and presentation abilities.
  • Self-driven with ability to manage multiple escalations under pressure.
  • Flexible to work in a 24x7 rotational environment if required.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at jamshiya@arttechgroup.com
summary: Senior SOC Lead/Consultant for Monitoring & Threat Detection. Responsibilities include incident triage, escalation management, detection improvement, and mentoring analysts. Requires 5-9 years of cybersecurity experience.

job_description:
AI/ML Engineer

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions and services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers to develop and drive new business opportunities internationally. The successful candidate will be responsible for discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Own the model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and data scientists, to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 3 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming with a focus on:
    • Code optimization and profiling
    • Multi-threading and multiprocessing
    • Object-oriented programming and design principles
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models combining text, vision, or audio.
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off!
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through ideas and innovation.
  • Work-life balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

Contact:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com.
summary: Seeking AI/ML Engineers to develop international business opportunities and create qualified leads. Responsibilities include building ML/DL solutions, Generative AI systems, and cloud-native ML engineering.

job_description:
Python Backend Developer - Immediate Joiners

We are looking for a Python Backend Developer to join our Computer Vision team and play a key role in developing high-performance backend services that power our AI and computer vision platforms.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for building and maintaining scalable APIs, managing data pipelines, and integrating with AI microservices for real-time processing, storage, and analytics. You will work in a fast-paced environment alongside AI engineers, DevOps, and product teams to design reliable systems that connect data, models, and user interfaces efficiently.

Key Responsibilities

Backend Development - Design, develop, and maintain scalable RESTful APIs using FastAPI or Flask frameworks. - Implement microservices to support computer vision and document AI workflows. - Ensure high-performance, secure, and maintainable code following modern backend standards.

Database & Data Management - Design and optimize database schemas in PostgreSQL (including indexing and query optimization). - Integrate with structured and unstructured data sources — including image metadata, annotations, and model results. - Manage migrations and data versioning using tools like Alembic or SQLAlchemy ORM.

Integration & Communication - Integrate backend systems with AI/ML inference services and cloud storage (e.g., AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage). - Develop task orchestration flows using Celery and Redis for background processing. - Work closely with frontend engineers (React, Next.js) to ensure smooth data exchange and API compatibility.

Deployment & Maintenance - Containerize backend services using Docker and manage deployments via GitHub Actions or CI/CD pipelines. - Monitor performance, handle scaling, and ensure uptime of production systems. - Write unit and integration tests to maintain code quality and system reliability.

Required Qualifications & Experience

  • 3–5 years of professional backend development experience with Python.
  • Strong knowledge of FastAPI, Flask, or similar Python web frameworks.
  • Proficiency in PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, and database optimization techniques.
  • Hands-on experience with Celery, Redis, and asynchronous task management.
  • Experience developing and maintaining Dockerized microservices.
  • Familiarity with Git, GitHub Actions, and CI/CD deployment workflows.
  • Understanding of REST API design principles and secure authentication mechanisms (JWT, OAuth2).
  • Comfortable working with AI-driven or data-intensive systems.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field preferred.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@nomdindia.com

job_description:
Accounting Associate/Sr. Accounting Associate (US GAAP)

This role involves the preparation and maintenance of financial statements in conformity with the Generally Accepted Accounting Principles of the United States (U.S. GAAP).

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Overseeing the day-to-day accounting processes.
  • Reviewing the accuracy of the monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
  • Managing site POCs or vendors (for accounting purposes).

Detailed Responsibilities:

  • Prepare and verify financial statements and ledgers for accuracy and regulatory compliance.
  • Handle revenue postings, inventory tracking, receivables, and payables management.
  • Apply and uphold internal accounting policies and control procedures.
  • Perform reconciliations of bank statements, credit card accounts, and intercompany balances.
  • Serve as the primary contact for internal accounting-related inquiries.
  • Support monthly and annual closing activities, including journal entry preparation.
  • Assist in audit processes by compiling and submitting necessary documentation.
  • Ensure adherence to financial compliance standards and support tax-related filings.

Additional Responsibilities:

  • 2-4 years of progressive accounting experience is preferred (experience in hospitality or food & beverage clients will be helpful but not mandatory).

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills to interact with internal associates and external partners.
  • Ability to apply advanced problem-solving skills to resolve complex issues.

job_description:
MySQL Server Database Administrator

Company: Dooth Location: Infopark Kochi

Dooth is seeking a skilled MySQL Server Database Administrator (DBA) with over 5 years of experience to manage and support our Microsoft SQL Server environments. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the performance, availability, and security of our databases. This role involves close collaboration with development and DevOps teams to implement scalable and high-performing solutions. Experience with PostgreSQL administration is a significant advantage.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Install, configure, and maintain MySQL database servers across development, testing, and production environments.
  • Monitor database performance, implement tuning strategies, and optimize queries and indexes.
  • Design and manage database backup, recovery, and replication strategies (e.g., Master-Slave, Group Replication, or Cluster).
  • Ensure database security, integrity, and availability through access controls, data encryption, and regular audits.
  • Perform database upgrades, patches, and migrations with minimal downtime.
  • Collaborate with developers to design efficient database schemas, stored procedures, and queries.
  • Troubleshoot performance issues, deadlocks, replication delays, and other database-related incidents.
  • Develop and maintain documentation for database architecture, configurations, and processes.
  • Automate routine database tasks using scripting languages such as Bash or Python.
  • Work closely with DevOps teams for continuous integration and deployment of database changes.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience as a MySQL DBA in a production environment.
  • Strong knowledge of MySQL 5.7/8.0 architecture, configuration, and administration.
  • Proficiency in query optimization and performance tuning.
  • Experience with replication, clustering, and high-availability setups.
  • Hands-on experience with backup/recovery tools (e.g., mysqldump, Percona XtraBackup).
  • Familiarity with Linux environments and shell scripting.
  • Understanding of database security practices and user management.
  • Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, Azure Database for MySQL) is a plus.
  • Experience with monitoring tools (e.g., Percona Monitoring, Prometheus, Grafana, Nagios).
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with PostgreSQL database administration, including performance tuning, backup, and replication.
  • Knowledge of NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Redis) is an advantage.
  • Familiarity with automation tools such as Ansible or Terraform.
  • Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and database version control.

  • Strong communication, problem-solving, and documentation skills.
  • Basic understanding of SAP modules and experience handling ticketing tools (e.g., JIRA, Zendesk).

job_description:

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Job Published: 07, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 14, Nov 2025 Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Introduction

We are seeking candidates with 3+ years of experience for the role of Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). This position focuses on ensuring the quality and reliability of our SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration. The role requires a strong blend of programming and QA expertise to design, develop, and execute both automated and manual tests. The SDET will be responsible for validating functional workflows, API integrations, and data accuracy, as well as building automation frameworks, integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines, and collaborating with development and business teams to deliver a robust and scalable solution.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain automated test suites using .NET Core/C#, Selenium, or Playwright.
  • Perform API testing for ECC-Optimizely integrations using Postman or RestSharp.
  • Validate migrated data using SQL queries and backend checks.
  • Implement unit and integration tests with xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
  • Set up and manage test pipelines in Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Conduct functional, regression, and end-to-end testing for ecommerce workflows.
  • Perform performance testing using JMeter, k6, or similar tools.
  • Ensure secure API practices and perform basic security testing (OWASP awareness).
  • Collaborate within Agile teams, participate in sprint planning, and report defects in JIRA or Azure Boards.
  • Generate test reports using ExtentReports, Allure, or custom dashboards.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills: - Technical Testing: - .NET Core / C#: Strong programming skills for writing automated tests and test utilities. - API Testing: Experience with tools like Postman, RestSharp, or Swagger for testing ECC-Optimizely integrations. - Unit Testing Frameworks: Proficiency in xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest. - Test Automation: Building and maintaining automation suites using Selenium WebDriver or Playwright (for UI testing). - SQL & Data Validation: Writing queries to validate migrated data between ECC and Optimizely. - CI/CD Integration: Setting up test pipelines in Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins. - Functional & Integration Testing: - End-to-End Test Scenarios: Covering product catalog, pricing, inventory, and order workflows. - Regression Testing: Ensuring stability after each migration phase. - Error Handling & Logging: Implementing robust logging and exception tracking. - Quality Practices: - Test Strategy & Planning: Creating test plans aligned with migration phases. - Defect Management: Using tools like JIRA, Azure Boards, or TestRail. - Version Control: Git for managing test code and collaboration.

Secondary Skills: - Performance & Security Testing: - Load Testing Tools: JMeter, k6, or Locust for performance validation. - Security Testing Basics: Awareness of OWASP Top 10 and secure API practices. - SAP ECC Awareness: - Basic ABAP Understanding: To interpret ECC logic and validate data extraction. - ECC Data Models: Familiarity with tables like MARA, KNA1, VBAK for test data setup. - Optimizely Platform Familiarity: - Optimizely Commerce Workflows: Understanding how catalog and order flows work. - CMS Testing: Validating content rendering and personalization logic. - Collaboration & DevOps: - Test Reporting Tools: Extent Reports, Allure, or custom dashboards. - Agile Methodology: Working in sprints, attending stand-ups, and contributing to retrospectives.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Job Scams:

It has come to our attention that some fraudsters are promising jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Please be aware that no payment is ever sought for jobs within Reflections. We contact our candidates exclusively through our official website or LinkedIn. All employment-related emails are sent through our official HR email ID. For any clarification or alerts on this subject, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking an experienced SDET for SAP to Optimizely migration. Responsibilities include test automation, API testing, and CI/CD integration.

job_description:

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: 07, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 14, Nov 2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking highly experienced candidates (8+ years) for a Lead Full Stack Developer role. Back-End (.NET): - .NET Core / C#: Building scalable services and APIs for Optimizely. - Entity Framework / LINQ: Data access and manipulation. - RESTful API Design: Creating secure, performant endpoints for ECC-Optimizely integration. - Authentication & Authorization: OAuth2, JWT, role-based access control. - Database Design: SQL Server or PostgreSQL schema modeling and optimization.

Architecture & Integration: - Optimizely/EPIServer Platform Knowledge: Deep understanding of CMS and Commerce architecture. - SAP ECC Data Models: Familiarity with MARA, KNA1, VBAK, etc., for integration planning. - Middleware & Integration Patterns: Experience with Azure Logic Apps, MuleSoft, or Boomi. - Microservices Architecture: Designing loosely coupled services for scalability. - CI/CD Pipelines: Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins for automated deployments. - Spire & PIM Integration: Experience integrating product and pricing data into e-commerce platforms.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - E-commerce Workflows: Product catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout. - B2B Commerce: Understanding of business customer journeys, bulk ordering, and account-based pricing.

Secondary Skills:

Front-End: - UI Frameworks: Material UI, Tailwind CSS, or Bootstrap. - Performance Optimization: Lazy loading, code splitting, caching strategies. - Accessibility (WCAG): Ensuring inclusive design.

Back-End: - GraphQL: For flexible data querying if used in Optimizely extensions. - Message Queues: RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus for async processing. - Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes for deployment and scaling.

Integration & DevOps: - Monitoring & Logging: ELK stack, Application Insights, or Prometheus. - Security Best Practices: Data encryption, secure API design, GDPR compliance. - Test Automation Awareness: Understanding of unit, integration, and performance testing.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - SAP ECC Migration Strategy: Understanding of data extraction, transformation, and validation. - Stakeholder Communication: Translating technical decisions into business impact.

job_description:
Senior Solution Architect – AI & Generative AI (Leadership Role)

Company: Softnotions Technologies (P) Ltd Location: Technopark, Trivandrum Contact: recruitment@softnotions.com Published: 07, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 14, Nov 2025

About the Role

Softnotions Technologies is seeking an experienced AI Solution Architect to join their leadership team. This role is crucial for designing and deploying enterprise-scale AI solutions, focusing on Machine Learning, Generative AI, Open-Source LLMs, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and Knowledge Engineering. The architect will be responsible for creating scalable AI platforms, building intelligent knowledge ecosystems, and advising on infrastructure (cloud/on-prem, GPU, storage, networking) across Construction, Healthcare, Retail, and Smart Infrastructure domains.

Experience: 10+ years (with 3–5 years in AI/ML architecture & solution delivery)

Key Responsibilities

AI Architecture & Strategy - Architect scalable and secure end-to-end AI platforms (data, models, APIs, knowledge layers, infrastructure). - Develop AI reference architectures and reusable solution accelerators for industries like Construction (BIM/document intelligence), Healthcare (clinical AI assistants), and Retail (personalization, demand forecasting). - Recommend and design cloud, hybrid, or on-prem hardware infrastructure, including GPU clusters, CPU resources, networking, storage, and cost-optimized scaling strategies.

Open-Source LLM & Generative AI Expertise - Work extensively with open-source LLMs (LLaMA, Mistral, Falcon, Mixtral, Gemma, OpenELM, BLOOM, GPT-NeoX). - Lead fine-tuning, quantization (LoRA, QLoRA), model distillation, performance optimization, and domain-specific adaptation. - Design and deploy self-hosted LLM solutions on Kubernetes, Docker, Hugging Face, vLLM, TGI, or DeepSpeed Inference. - Address model licensing, data governance, and security implications of open-source models.

Knowledge Base & RAG Systems - Architect and manage enterprise knowledge bases, including document ingestion, metadata structuring, embeddings, and vector DB design. - Design RAG pipelines using vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS, Qdrant), embeddings, metadata storage, and retrieval optimization. - Lead implementation of RAG, knowledge graphs, ontology-based data models, and semantic search systems. - Define data governance, document access control, knowledge lifecycle management, and multi-tenant knowledge systems.

Solution Design & Deployment - Build scalable pipelines for data engineering, feature stores, vector databases, model training, fine-tuning & inference APIs. - Implement MLOps/LLMOps — CI/CD pipelines, experiment tracking, versioning, monitoring, governance, and automated retraining. - Ensure compliance with enterprise security, privacy, and regulatory standards (HIPAA, GDPR, HL7/FHIR).

Technology & Infrastructure Ownership - Provide hardware architecture recommendations: Cloud vs On-Prem GPU infrastructure, distributed model hosting, autoscaling, load balancing, storage/compute/network optimization. - Standardize AI technology stack: OpenAI, Azure/AWS/GCP AI, LangChain, Hugging Face, MLFlow, Kubeflow, Kafka, Airflow, Kubernetes. - Integrate AI systems with existing enterprise platforms (ERP/CRM, BIM platforms, PACS/EHR systems, Retail POS & Inventory). - Establish CI/CD pipelines for AI, including automated training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring. - Implement MLFlow, Kubeflow, Airflow, LangSmith, DVC, Jenkins for experiment tracking and model lifecycle management.

Qualifications & Experience

Technical Expertise - Proven experience in architecting and deploying LLMs, Generative AI, open-source AI models, and enterprise ML solutions. - Expertise in RAG, Vector Databases, KB management, semantic search, prompt orchestration frameworks (LangChain, LlamaIndex). - Expert in cloud infrastructure, GPU orchestration, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), distributed systems, and microservices. - Proficient in Python, API frameworks (FastAPI, Flask), Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). - Experience in GPU infrastructure, model parallelism, distributed inference, and performance optimization.

Domain Experience (Preferred) - Construction: BIM data layers, digital twins, project cost estimation AI, drawing analysis. - Healthcare: PHI data processing, clinical AI workflows, compliance (HIPAA, HL7/FHIR, GDPR). - Retail: Pricing intelligence, customer journey analytics, inventory demand forecasting.

Soft Skills & Leadership - Ability to lead cross-functional AI teams (Data Engineers, ML Engineers, DevOps, Solution Designers). - Strong ability to translate AI capabilities into business outcomes, strategic roadmaps, and client value. - Excellent communication, documentation, and presentation skills for stakeholders, clients, and CXO leadership teams.

Contact Email: recruitment@softnotions.com
summary: Lead enterprise AI solution design focusing on Generative AI, LLMs, and RAG. Architect scalable platforms and infrastructure for diverse industry domains.

We are looking for 12+ years experienced candidates for this role.

Project Ownership - End-to-End Leadership: Proven ability to lead projects from blueprint to execution. - Vendor Transition: Skilled in taking over architecture and development from external consultants. - Stakeholder Communication: Capable of translating technical decisions into business value for diverse audiences.

Secondary Skills:

AI & Automation - Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks. - Leverage tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc., for content support. - Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates. - Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Bonus / Preferred: - Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools. - Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly). - Prior experience supporting UK/Europe teams. - Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

job_description:
About Us

Way.com — America’s dominant automotive super app, powering every mile for over 10 million customers—from auto insurance and parking to EV charging and more. Leveraging cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and advanced data analytics, we deliver innovative, personalized solutions that transform car ownership. Featured by Bloomberg and ranked 48th on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list of fastest-growing companies worldwide and recognized as the top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, we’re making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Job Title: Sales Expert

Work Arrangement: On-site Employment Type: Full-time Closing Date: 22, Nov 2025 Job Published: 07, Nov 2025 Contact Email: careers@way.com

Role Overview

We are seeking dynamic, customer-focused Sales Experts to join our Refinance Team. In this role, you will be the voice of our product — engaging directly with customers, understanding their needs, and helping them choose the best refinance solutions. This is a B2C sales role, where communication skills, persuasion, and a passion for sales will make all the difference.

Key Responsibilities

  • Engage with potential customers through inbound and outbound calls, emails, and chats.
  • Clearly explain refinance products, features, and benefits to customers.
  • Build trust and rapport with customers to convert inquiries into successful sales.
  • Consistently achieve individual and team sales targets.
  • Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions in CRM systems.
  • Collaborate with Customer Support, Product, and Marketing teams to ensure a smooth post-sale experience.
  • Stay updated on product knowledge, process updates, and industry trends.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in any discipline (preferably Business or Engineering).
  • 2–5 years of experience in B2C sales, telesales, or customer acquisition (preferably in financial products, banking, insurance, or fintech).
  • Excellent communication skills in English (verbal and written).

job_description:
Junior DevOps Technical Support Engineer

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Job Published: 07, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 22, Dec 2025

Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA Work Arrangement: Work From Office (Trivandrum)

Brief Description

REIZEND (P) Ltd is seeking a proactive and highly skilled Technical Support Engineer with 0.5 - 2 years of experience to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects. This role requires working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. The ideal candidate will be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner, with strong problem-solving skills.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services like CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services: - Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads. - Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making informed decisions. - Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools: - Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues. - Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health. - Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation. - Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security: - Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues. - Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic. - Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic. - Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols. - Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications. - Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains: - Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging. - Understanding of Kubernetes concepts for managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues, along with related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms. - Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines. - Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management: - Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging. - Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication: - Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents. - Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers. - Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.
summary: Seeking a Technical Support Engineer with 0.5-2 years of experience for a work-from-office role in Trivandrum. Responsibilities include troubleshooting cloud, networking, and DevOps issues across global projects.

This position is not entry-level: candidates must demonstrate hands-on experience in managing and configuring firewalls, load balancers, and routers within complex enterprise environments. The selected candidate will be responsible for maintaining, securing, and optimizing client network infrastructures to ensure maximum performance, reliability, and continuity. A curious and proactive attitude, the willingness to learn new tools, explore emerging technologies, and propose innovative solutions when client needs evolve, will be considered a strong plus.

  • Firewalls (Cisco, Fortinet) — practical experience required
  • Load balancers (NetScaler, F5) — practical experience required
  • Routers and Layer 3 switches (Cisco, HPE Aruba)

  • Act as a consultant, not just an executor: proactively analyze business needs, define technical requirements, and design network architectures aligned with client goals.
  • Prepare and maintain detailed technical documentation, procedures, and configuration baselines — ensuring clarity, reproducibility, and compliance with shared standards.

  • Firewalls (Cisco, Fortinet)
  • Load balancers (NetScaler, F5)
  • Routers and switches (Cisco, HPE Aruba)
  • Certifications: CCNA or equivalent basic certifications alone are NOT sufficient. Candidates holding a CCNP are strongly preferred and will receive priority consideration. Higher or equivalent certifications (CCIE) are a plus.
  • Experience: 3–5 years of experience in a similar role.
  • Solid understanding of dynamic routing protocols (OSPF, BGP).
  • Experience with Windows Server and Linux environments.
  • Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and documentation skills.
  • Excellent communication, customer orientation, and teamwork abilities.

job_description:
Technical Architect - AI/ML

About Techversant:

Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience in providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans various domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, and Vue.js, catering to diverse industry verticals worldwide.

Contact Information: - Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd - Address: Module No: 2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 - Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com - Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com - Job Published: 05, Nov 2025 - Closing Date: 18, Nov 2025

Role Overview:

We are seeking a visionary and hands-on AI Solution Architect to lead at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This client-facing leadership role involves conceptualizing, designing, and delivering robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of emerging AI trends. You will manage the entire lifecycle of AI solution development, from client interaction and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

Client Engagement & Consulting: - Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems. - Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies. - Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.

Solution Design & Architecture: - Define end-to-end AI architecture, including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies. - Select appropriate AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints. - Ensure architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.

Hands-On Development: - Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts as needed. - Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations. - Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.

Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight: - Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team. - Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery. - Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

Preferred Skills:

AI/ML/DL Expertise: - Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. - Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs). - Hands-on experience with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.

Architecture & System Design: - Strong grasp of designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture. - Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.

Cloud & Platforms: - Proficient in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio). - Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).

Data Engineering: - Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning. - Experience with tools such as Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.

Product & Project Ownership: - Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations. - Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.

Soft Skills: - Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills. - Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred/Nice-to-Have: - Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.). - Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF. - Experience in NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, or Recommendation Engines. - Understanding of ethical AI, explainable AI, and compliance in AI systems. - Publications, contributions to open-source, or AI certifications.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.
  • Cloud AI/ML platform certifications or advanced AI specialization certifications are a plus.

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions across various industries. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans numerous technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, and Vue.

What’s Important to Us:

We are looking for experienced Senior AI/ML Engineers to drive new international business opportunities, discover sales opportunities, and create qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Own the entire model lifecycle, from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work closely with product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Ability to develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Experience in designing and delivering ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Skilled in creating functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Experience implementing machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines for web-scale use.
  • Proven experience in designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep Learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming, including code optimization and profiling, multi-threading and multiprocessing, and object-oriented programming and design principles.
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models (text, vision, audio).
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs (training hours, certifications, innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company sponsored international tours.

job_description:
Senior Data Scientist at Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Module No:2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala , 695581 Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Job Published: 05,Nov 2025 Closing Date: 18,Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 16 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services globally. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, IOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence.

What’s Important to Us:

We are looking for an experienced Senior Data Scientist Engineer to lead the design and development of advanced data systems that drive analytics, machine learning, and business intelligence. The ideal candidate must possess deep expertise in both data engineering and data science, with a proven ability to handle complex datasets, build scalable predictive models, and deliver actionable insights that guide strategic organizational decisions.

Job Description:

  • Perform data mining or extract usable data from valuable data sources.
  • Utilize machine learning tools to select features, create, and optimize classifiers.
  • Preprocess structured and unstructured data.
  • Enhance data collection procedures to gather all relevant information for developing analytic systems.
  • Process, cleanse, and validate the integrity of data for analysis.
  • Analyze large volumes of information to identify patterns and solutions.
  • Develop prediction systems and machine learning algorithms.
  • Present findings clearly and effectively.
  • Propose solutions and strategies to address business challenges.
  • Collaborate with Business and IT teams.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience: 4+ years of experience as a data scientist.
  • Programming: Knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and database query languages like SQL, Hive, Pig is desirable. Familiarity with Scala, Java, or C++ is an added advantage.
  • Statistics: Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators, etc. Proficiency in statistics is essential.
  • Machine Learning: Good knowledge of machine learning methods such as k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, and Decision Forests.
  • Math Skills: Strong foundation in Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra, important for predictive modeling and algorithm optimization.
  • Data Wrangling: Proficiency in handling data imperfections.

job_description:
Data Scientist

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Module No:2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala , 695581 Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Closing Date: 18, Nov 2025 Job Published: 05, Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption. We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, etc., catering to various industry verticals globally.

About the Role:

We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist Engineer to build and improve data systems that power analytics, machine learning, and reporting. The ideal candidate has experience with both data engineering and data science, able to manage large datasets, create predictive models, and turn data into useful insights for better business decisions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data sources.
  • Using machine learning tools to select features, create and optimize classifiers.
  • Carrying out the preprocessing of structured and unstructured data.
  • Enhancing data collection procedures to include all relevant information for developing analytic systems.
  • Processing, cleansing, and validating the integrity of data to be used for analysis.
  • Analyzing large amounts of information to find patterns and solutions.
  • Developing prediction systems and machine learning algorithms.
  • Presenting results in a clear manner.
  • Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges.
  • Collaborate with Business and IT teams.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience: 2+ years of experience as a data scientist.
  • Programming Skills: Knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and database query languages like SQL, Hive, Pig is desirable.
  • Additional Languages: Familiarity with Scala, Java, or C++ is an added advantage.
  • Statistics: Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators, etc. Proficiency in statistics is essential for data-driven companies.
  • Machine Learning: Good knowledge of machine learning methods like k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests.
  • Math Skills: Strong Math Skills (Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra) - understanding the fundamentals of multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra is important as they form the basis of a lot of predictive performance or algorithm optimization techniques.
  • Data Wrangling: Proficiency in handling imperfections in data is an important aspect of a data scientist job description.
  • Data Visualization: Experience with Data Visualization Tools like matplotlib, ggplot, d3.js., Tableau that help to visually encode data.
  • Communication: Excellent Communication Skills – it is incredibly important to describe findings to a technical and non-technical audience.
  • Software Engineering: Strong Software Engineering Background.
  • Tools: Hands-on experience with data science tools.
  • Problem-Solving: Problem-solving aptitude.
  • Analytical Skills: Analytical mind and great business sense.
  • Education: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field is preferred.
  • Proven Experience: Proven Experience as Data Analyst or Data Scientist.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off!
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on Performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through idea and innovation.
  • Work life Balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.
summary: Seeking a Data Scientist Engineer with data engineering and ML experience. Responsibilities include data mining, model creation, and presenting insights for business decisions.
